schema.lat.max: The location latitude must be less than 90

schema.lng.max: The location latitude must be less than 180

schema.geohash.max: The location geohash must be less than 12 characters

schema.banner.url: The profile banner url is incomplete

schema.process.required: The product processing method is required

schema.lot.max: The product lot must be less than 120 characters

schema.year.positive: The product production year must be positive

schema.price_amt.positive: The product price amount must be positive
